name: NEXVOO  N120W
shortDescription: Dual-Cam Android Video Conference Bar for Large Room | N120W - Nexvoo
description:
Dual-Cam video Conference Bar Perfect For 

Large Meeting Rooms

Nexvoo's new generation of large meeting room video bar DoubleView Pro N120W, using a combination of 4K ultra-wide-angle lens and telephoto lens, dual-camera collaboration, taking into account the panoramic view and detail presentation of the meeting room. With the built-in Android 10.0 system, there is no need to bring a PC or Mac to the meeting room.




Built-In Android 10.0 System

N120W video collaboration bar is built-in Android 10.0 system. Most of the video conferencing applications like zoom,teams and Google meet can be operated without a laptop or a Mac. Users can remotely operate the system after connecting to the screen via HDMI.

4K Dual Camera System,120° Ultra-Wide-Angle Lens

All the participants can be clearly seen. The telephoto camera can zoom in to view details in a larger meeting room. The video bar can automatically optimize the brightness according to lighting conditions, supporting dual 4K HD video conferencing calling and content sharing.

Multiple AI-Powered Smart Technologies

The sound source location and voice tracking allow you to experience real large-scale audio and video effects of the conference room. N120W can automatically adjust the framing size according to changes in the number of participants and location to present the best viewfinder.

AI Noise Reduction

With powerful audio pickup and incredible noise reduction technology, every speech can be heard clearly, so that you will not be disturbed. N120W dual-cam Android video collaboration bar is equipped with 8 MEMS microphone arrays and 8m high-quality pickup distance.







Compatible with Barco ClickShare

N120W Android Dual-camera video conferencing bar is smartly compatible with Barco ClickShare for easy content sharing.



Additional Features

USB Connectivity

N120W can support the connection of PC via USB-C cable, as a USB device of the PC, provide high-quality audio and video capture capabilities for the video conferencing application on the PC

Compatible With Most Video Conference Applications

Users are free to use the any video conferencing applications on desktop, including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, etc. 

Realistic Sound Quality

The speaker can bring realistic sound, so that everyone can feel full, excellent sound

name: Nexvoo Nexpod Pro N149
shortDescription:
Speaker Tracking Video Conference Camera with Bluetooth for Huddle Room | N149 - Nexvoo

  • 4K UHD Resolution
  • Battery Powered
  • Al Auto Framing
  • Omni Directional Microphone
description:
Speaker Tracking Camera for Small and Huddle Rooms

N149 speaker tracking conferencing camera is specifically designed for huddle rooms and small teams of less than six people, with a wide 120° wide-angle, digital pan and mechanical tilt function.

5x High-Definition Digital Zoom

5x high-definition digital zoom, and clear and detailed optical effects, allowing all participants in the room to have a glance. 

Auto Speaker Tracking and Framing

The speaker tracking and framing function can automatically locate the current speaker and present its close-up picture so that everyone knows who is speaking.

Suitable for Most Video Conferencing Applications

N149 4K conferencing camera suitable for most meeting apps like zoom, Google meet, teams. Users can freely choose any meeting application according to their needs.

Compatible with Barco ClickShare

NexPod N149 4K speaker tracking video conference camera is smartly compatible with Barco ClickShare for easy content sharing.

Easy to Set up

Without special software, training or maintenance services, participating in a video conference has never been easier.

360° Full Azimuth Sound Effect

It allows users to talk smoothly within a diameter of 3 meters, while echo cancellation and noise reduction technologies bring immersive sound effects. 

USB or Bluetooth Wireless Connections

You can use USB or Bluetooth mobile speakers to make excellent audio calls.

Rechargeable Battery

When the battery is fully charged (charged via USB or AC power), it can support up to 3 hours of video conference or 8 hours of speakerphone calls

name: Nexvoo CLASSCAM CC520
shortDescription:
AI Teacher Auto Tracking Camera for Classroom | CC520 - Nexvoo

  • Classroom Camera
  • Auto framing
  • UHD 4K resolution
description:
AI teacher tracking Camera Perfect For All Classrooms

Nexvoo CC520 CLASSCAM is a high-definition lecturer auto-tracking and framing video conference camera for classroom with 6mm focal length, which provides an easy plug-and-play connection to your laptop, PC and computer. 

Perfect for Online Teaching

Suitable for classroom, experience 4K UHD auto tracking camera, which can control almost any application environment and greatly improve online teaching experience.

Teacher Tracking Camera Features with AI Body Movement Tracking

CC520 uses AI technology to recognize and track teacher's movement across a field of view. Body movement tracking camera gives operators the ability to track an individual and even customize frame settings to capture entire white board spaces.

Preset Zone Tracking

Users can create two unique zones within a scene, such as a whiteboard area or a platform. When a teacher moves within these zones, the camera will stay fixed on this zone, so the audience does not miss any important information.

Mirror The Video

Users can easily rotate the vertical direction of the video. 

USB Plug-And-Play Connectivity

With no special software, training, or maintenance required, connecting to a remote classroom has never been easier.

Remote Control

Easily operate camera pan/tilt/zoom and audio functions (mute) during video teaching.

name: Nexvoo NexFone N380
shortDescription:
Google GMS Certified Business Media Desk Phone

  • 8-inch 1920 x 1200 resolution FHD capacitive touch screen
  • High-fidelity sound quality: HD handset, HD Speaker
  • Hearing aid compatible (HAC) handset
  • Dual-band Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz/5.0GHz
  • Bluetooth 4.2
  • Android 10.0 operating system
  • Built-in Google Play Store
  • 8M pixels camera with privacy shutter
description:
Google GMS Certified Video Phone

Nexvoo's latest NexFone N380 is a high-end Google certified and native SIP multimedia smartphone that integrates <br/> audio, video, and applications. It also supports the installation of third-party Apps to meet the diverse customization <br/> needs of different companies.

Certified by Google and with a built-in Android system, NexFone N380 is compatible with all video conferencing <br/>systems, easy to download on the Play Store, experience the latest software for the first time.

High-Quality Sound Effect

Professional high-fidelity sound cavity design can easily achieve high-definition sound quality, full hands-free sound <br/> effects, omnidirectional sound pickup, full-duplex.

WiFi And Bluetooth Connection

Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, can access the wireless network, cooperate with Bluetooth headset or mobile phone. <br/> Allows users to completely get rid of the shackles of the desk, greatly improving flexibility.

Rich Interface And Flexible Expansion

With an external headset or earphone, POE powered Ethernet port; support USB2.0 expansion, video recording, <br/> and screenshots can be realized through U disk.

name: Nexvoo NexPad T530
shortDescription:
NexPad T530 | 4K HD Google Certified Video Conferencing Tablet

  • 8M pixels camera 
  • Dual-band Wi-Fi
  • 8-inch Touch Screen
  • 2-Mic Array
  • Android 10.0 operating system
  • Dual-band Wi-Fi - 2.4GHz/5.0GHz

﻿
description:
NexPad T530

Nexvoo's newly launched NexPad T530 is a high-end smart conference tablet integrating audio, video and applications. It has an 8-inch multi-touch Retina-level FHD (full high-definition) capacitive screen and an 8-megapixel high-definition camera, built-in Bluetooth 4.2 module and Wi-Fi module, integrated high-power speakers, dual microphone arrays, providing high-definition audio and video experience at the same time, it also greatly improves the efficiency of group collaboration and personal office. NexPad T530 is based on Android 10.0 system, the interface operation is more convenient, smooth and intelligent. Its built-in Google Play Store, you can install any video conferencing and video entertainment applications, to meet your home office, online learning, video entertainment needs, with HDMI projection and excellent audio quality, allowing you to experience the scene in person feel.

• 4K Camera

NexPad T530 has a 4K camera with 78° FOV, enabling you to achieve professional video performance, and high-definition video experience makes communication easier.

• High-Definition Audio

NexPad T530 has excellent audio quality that similar products do not have, built-in multiple smart functions such as echo cancellation and noise shielding, which can automatically remove interfering background noise and other unnecessary sounds.

• Integrated Video Collaboration Solution

The shape is simple and light, and it is very convenient to use and set up. It helps to show the full charm of the video conferencing solution and is fully qualified for various work occasions.

• HDMI Output

With the help of HDMI projection technology, whether in a meeting room or home office, you can experience the feeling of face-to-face communication on site.

• Always Secure

With the built-in camera shutter, microphone mute button and multi-digit digital access PIN, NexPad T530 can provide security and privacy whether in use or at rest.

name: NEXVOO   N110
shortDescription:
All-In-One 4K UHD Video Conference Bar for Medium Conference Room | N110 - Nexvoo


  • 4K UHD Image Sensor
  •  120° FOV
  •  Sony High-Sensitivity Camera Sensor
  • Auto Framing and Speaker Tracking
  • 6-element beamforming microphone array
  • 16ft / 5m pickup range

﻿
description:
All-in-one video conference bar for medium-sized conference room

OneView N110 is a conference camera designed for small and medium-sized conference rooms. <br/> With the 120° ultra-wide field of view that can cover the entire room, N110 allows everyone in the conference room to clearly enter the lens. <br/>The low-distortion lens, 4K Ultra HD optical performance and two camera presets designed by Nexvoo can <br/> bring extraordinary video quality and further enhance face-to-face collaboration. The N110 also has six horizontally <br/> directed beamforming microphones and customtuned speakers to help ensure that the meeting sound is as exciting as the video. <br/>Its plug-and-play function is suitable for almost any video platform, <br/> providing a cost-effective solution for small and medium-sized conference rooms. 

Super-wide 120° field of view

OneView N110 has an ultra-wide field of view of 120°, allowing everyone in the room to be seen, even those close to the camera or seated at the edges of the room.

Ultra HD 4K image sensor

Supports multiple resolutions, including 4K (Ultra HD), 1080p (Full HD) and 720p (HD) to best support the quality offered by your application and monitor.

Auto framing and speaker tracking function

OneView N110 can automatically obtain the best image of the conference room according to the participants and their location in the conference room, <br/> and automatically adjust the view when participants enter and exit the conference room to ensure that everyone is clearly visible and presents the best picture. <br/>The speaker tracking function can automatically locate the current speaker and present its close-up <br/> picture so that everyone knows who is speaking.

5x HD zoom

Zero in on close-ups of objects and whiteboard content with outstanding detail and clarity
